00017 /* Register address and configuration for a CN38XX/CN58XX device. */
00018 typedef struct {
00019 
00020     /** PCI interrupt summary register for CN38xx/CN58xx */
00021     void              *intr_sum_reg;
00022 
00023     /** PCI interrupt enable register for CN38xx/CN58xx */
00024     void              *intr_enb_reg;
00025 
00026     /** The PCI interrupt mask used by interrupt handler for CN38xx/CN58xx */
00027     cavium_atomic_t    intr_mask;
00028 
00029     /** The PCI bus frequency for this device. For CN58XX, this is
00030         auto-detected. For CN3XXX, this field takes its value from
00031         OCTEON_PCI_BUS_HZ. */
00032     uint32_t           pci_freq;
00033 
00034     cn3xxx_config_t   *conf;
00035 
00036 } octeon_cn3xxx_t;
